Communication

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Communication.Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class implements the server that receives the connection petitions from the clients.

    This class implements a runnable Thread that waits for the client's connection's petitions. It also configures the maximum number of connections accepted, the port number and manages the dedicated servers that creates for each petition.

    Version:
    v0.1 04/10/2014
    Author:
    Eduard de Torres
    See Also:
    Thread, Socket, SocketThread
